Articles.Content: Hello, I recently started playing KSP and I look forward to joining the community, any tips and tricks would be appreciated.
Welcome to the forums! Feel free to PM me if you have any questions regarding KSP!

Welcome to the forums!

You can find a wealth of useful information in the Drawing Board, which is linked in my signature. Don't be afraid to ask specific questions in the Gameplay Questions subforum as well, as that's what it's there for.

Hope this helps!
